This is a Christmas gift for my daughter but she seems to enjoy it quite a lot.  Thanks a lot

The dvd came in good time from fun factory and was in great condition. The dvd itself was quite entertaining, the storylines were good and I did enjoy it . If you like goosebumps I think this would be a good dvd to buy especially for younger children like around 2nd grade and up. Hope this helps

ALl of the Goosebump movies are a little too cheesy for me.  Even my children were really started or filled with fear by these.  Not sure if that a indicator of the fear our children see daily or if Goosebumps really just has lost theirJe ne sais quoi.
She really likes. I personally find the acting and story line subpar, but hey, I'm just a grownup. What do I know.
these are great for a family night with the kids the movies are still entertaining for me as an adult my 11 year old son loves them the most. but my 5 year old daughter enjoys them too.

Here are three more episodes from the 90s Goosebumps series based on the books by R.L. Stine.

In Ghost Beach, there is a 300 year-old ghost living in a cave on the beach.

Cooper Holmes is scared of his own shadow, but now he must deal with a ghost in The Barking Ghost.

Be Careful What You Wish For... has unpopular student Samantha Byrd granted three wishes. These wishes may improve her life, or make her life worse.

This is a great DVD to watch with your kids around Halloween.

My grandson loves to be scared and these movies are perfect for him.  He and his sister watch them again and again.  My daughter grew up reading the books and they will soon be passed on to her son for his enjoyment.  Great buy for a kids scary movie!

Normally my family LOVES the Goosebumps movies, but this one didn't keep us interested at all! I was really quite surprised, considering we do enjoy all of them. Ghost Beach gets a thumbs down. Sorry Mr. Stine ~

be careful what you wish for- was excellent
night in terror tower- really sucked long and dragged out
stay out of the basement- was really good

to buy these dvds individually they are too much but this 3 pack is such a deal. highly recommended to those fans of are you afraid of the dark and anyone who wants a scare.
